title: Salvage Hunters - Season 1 Complete
description:
Enjoy the first season of Salvage Hunters


Drew Pritchard is a modern-day treasure hunter (think more Lovejoy than Tim Wonnacott), criss-crossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants.
He loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countryÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ãƒâ€“s architectural backwaters, his crack team of restorers give old and rare finds a new lease of life.
Follow Drew on his travels as he tries to satisfy demanding customers, including priority access to a sprawling Scottish estate, his hopes to uncover a bit of country house magic and an old-school scrapyard in Coventry which is like heaven to Drew. (Source: Quest)
